shortcuts.description: Provide a 'trigger' to start the shortcut and the 'action' that the shortcut should do.

keyId.description: Provide a key to trigger the shortcut.

clickType.description: Provide the type of trigger click: 'down' to press, 'up' to release and 'tap' to press and release quickly.

content.description: Provide some string to be pasted.

keyId.description: Provide a key to trigger the shortcut.

clickType.description: Provide the type of click: 'down' to press, 'up' to release and 'tap' to press and release quickly.

actionType.description:
Inform the type of action:
 - 'paste': use this by passing a simple string value in the 'content' field, that value will be pasted by this action.
 - 'sequence': use this by passing an array of keys in the 'keys' field, that value will click each key passed.
 - 'copyPasteClipboard': use this by passing a simple string value in the 'content' field, that value will be pasted using the clipboard.
